# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.cer$
\.ico$
\.idraw$
\.intentdefinition$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.lproj/.*\.strings$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.pbxproj$
\.pdf$
\.PNG$
\.png$
\.sketch/
\.storyboard$
\.svg$
\.ttf$
\.tvg$
\.wav$
\.xcscheme$
^external/
^fastlane/screenshots/(?!en)..[-/]
^fastlane/screenshots/.._
^\.github/
^\Qdocs/yarn-error.log\E$
^\Qfastlane/metadata-emm/en-US/marketing_url.txt\E$
^\Qfastlane/metadata-owncloud-online/en-US/marketing_url.txt\E$
^\Qfastlane/metadata/en-US/marketing_url.txt\E$
^\QownCloud/Release Notes/ReleaseNotes.plist\E$
^\QownCloudTests/Resources/test_certificate.cer\E$
